trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> elements within a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 정보를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> 내에서 요소는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: PageContent elements are the only allowable child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
trans-unit.target: PageContent 요소는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> 만 사용할 수 있는 자식 요소

trans-unit.source: The order of the PageContent elements within the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> defines the page order.
trans-unit.target: 내에서 PageContent 요소의 순서는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>페이지 순서를 정의 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: PageContent provides information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> elements within a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> without the requiring the application to load individual pages.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 정보를 제공 하는 PageContent는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>내의 요소는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>요구 개별 페이지를 로드 하지 않고.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> dependency property specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>종속성 속성을 지정 된 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the PageContent element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *Open XML Paper Specification* available for download at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: PageContent 요소에 대 한 자세한 내용은 XPS의 3 장 참조 *Open XML Paper Specification* 에서 다운로드할 수 [XPS: 사양 및 라이선스 다운로드](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> 이 연관 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Child property returns a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> when: 1.
trans-unit.target: 자식 속성은 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>때: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> has an immediate <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> child defined in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>직계 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>에 정의 된 자식 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 태그.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage></xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.System%23Windows%23Markup%23IAddChild%23AddChild%2A> has been called to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> as the child of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.System%23Windows%23Markup%23IAddChild%23AddChild%2A>설정 하 고 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>있는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> 의 자식으로</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> 호출한</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.System%23Windows%23Markup%23IAddChild%23AddChild%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Child property returns **null** when: 1.
trans-unit.target: 자식 속성은 반환 **null** 때: 1입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> property (when specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> is not cached).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>의해 설정 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>속성 (의해 지정 된 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>속성에는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>캐시 되지 않습니다).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> to return the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> when set by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>반환 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>으로 설정 된 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *XML Paper Specification* available for download at [http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx).
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>요소인 XPS의 3 장 참조 *XML Paper Specification* 에서 다운로드할 수 [http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage You cannot use this property in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML에서이 속성을 사용할 수 없습니다 XAML 텍스트 사용 하면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref>, or **null** when the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source*> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> 이 연관 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"> </xref>, 또는 **null** 때는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> 설정한는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source*>

trans-unit.source: Loads and returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> content element.
trans-unit.target: 로드 하 고 반환 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> 콘텐츠 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: GetPageRoot performs synchronous loading and parsing of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: GetPageRoot 동기 로드 및 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> 구문 분석 수행

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>instead of GetPageRoot to avoid thread blocking while the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> loads.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 사용은 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>스레드를 방지 하기 위해 GetPageRoot 대신 차단 시간이 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>로드.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to always reload the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> even if it has been previously loaded and cached; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to load the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> only if there is no cached version.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>항상 다시 로드는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> 그 이전에 로드 되어 캐시; 하는 경우에 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 로드 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> 캐시 된 버전이 있는 경우에 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The root element of the visual tree for this page.
trans-unit.target: 이 페이지에 대 한 시각적 트리의 루트 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously loads and returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> content element.
trans-unit.target: 비동기적으로 로드 하 고 반환 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> 콘텐츠 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: GetPageRootAsync asynchronously loads and parses the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> data stream associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.
trans-unit.target: GetPageRootAsync는 비동기적으로 로드 하 고 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>이 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> 와 연결 된 데이터 스트림을</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> 구문 분석

trans-unit.source: Other threads will continue to run while GetPageRootAsync completes.
trans-unit.target: 다른 스레드가 계속 GetPageRootAsync가 완료 될 때 실행 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following steps illustrate how to load the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> content asynchronously: 1.
trans-unit.target: 다음 단계에는 로드 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>비동기적으로 콘텐츠: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler> delegate and add it to be notified of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> events.
trans-unit.target: 만들기는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler>대리자를 추가 하 여 알림을 받을 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Call GetPageRootAsync.
trans-unit.target: GetPageRootAsync를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> event occurs and the delegate is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> content has completed loading.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted>이벤트가 발생 하 고 대리자가 호출 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>콘텐츠 로드가 완료.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The loaded <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> element is returned through the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 로드 된 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>요소는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `<PageContent>` element, see chapter 3 of the XPS specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 자세한 내용은 `<PageContent>` 요소에서 가져올 수 있습니다는 XPS 사양의 3 장 참조 [XPS: 사양 및 라이선스 다운로드](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to always reload the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> even if it has been previously loaded and cached; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to load the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> only if there is no cached version.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>항상 다시 로드는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> 그 이전에 로드 되어 캐시; 하는 경우에 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 로드 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> 캐시 된 버전이 있는 경우에 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Cancels any current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*> operation in progress.
trans-unit.target: 현재 취소 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*>작업이 진행 중입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*>

trans-unit.source: GetPageRootAsyncCancel cancels any <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> operation that has not already finished with a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: GetPageRootAsyncCancel을 모두 취소 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>와 아직 완료 되지 않았으면 작업은 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*> has completed.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*>완료 되었습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*>

trans-unit.source: The GetPageRootCompleted event is handled by methods based on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: GetPageRootCompleted 이벤트가 기반으로 하는 방법으로 처리 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler>위임.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget"></xref> elements that identify the hyperlink-addressable locations on the page.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget"> </xref> 페이지에 하이퍼링크를 주소 지정 가능한 위치를 식별 하는 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: LinkTargets will never return `null`, but the collection may contain zero elements.
trans-unit.target: LinkTargets 반환 하지 것입니다 `null`, 하지만 컬렉션 요소 개수가&0;을 포함할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext>인터페이스.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>

trans-unit.source: The base URI of the current context.
trans-unit.target: 현재 컨텍스트의 기본 URI입니다.
